name: E-goi - Automation, SMS & E-mail Marketing
headline: Marketing Automation with Artificial Intelligence. The technology that increases sales online and offline.
overview:
E-goi offers a technology ecosystem specifically designed to increase your E-commerce sales.
Track customers from the first contact, at every stage, across multiple channels and in an automated way.
With automations initiated by specific actions, achieve a hyper-personalized and omnichannel communication strategy.
We walk alongside major brands such as O Boticário, Mormaii, Banco do Brasil, Honda, Estadão, among others, with the goal of increasing sales and revolutionizing the way of communicating.
• Omnichannel Marketing Automation
• Phygital Experience
• Customer Data Platform
• Artificial Intelligence
features: Omnichannel Communication - Email Marketing, SMS Marketing, Voice Messaging, Push Notifications (Web Push and Push Mobile) and Social Media Campaigns.
Abandoned Cart Recovery by SMS or Email.
Capturing Leads - Landing Pages, Pop-ups, Whatsapp Leads, Forms, Facebook Lead Ads and Facebook Audiences.
Automatic contact synchronization - easy management and segmentation.
Dynamic Retargeting campaigns in all channels.
Transactional Communication - unpaid bill, purchase status and shipment tracking.
NBO (Next Best Offer) - suggestion of the next purchase through Artificial Intelligence.
CDP (Customer Data Platform) and Marketing Automation - unique shopping experience in real time, both in the online and physical store, through historical data.
Upselling and Cross-selling through hyper-personalized automated recommendations with 1:1 messaging.
Out-of-the-box workflows - multichannel automation flows based on your customer's buying journey.
A/B testing and detailed reporting for results optimization.
Track & Engage - behavioral analysis and process automation based on consumer behavior in the store.
NPS (Net Promoter Score) and Loyalty Modules - satisfaction analysis and transformation of new customers into loyal ones through loyalty campaigns and gamification mechanics.
SMS Follow Price - functionality that allows consumers to follow the prices of their favorite products.
